event.title: August 1864, prior to the Battle of Jonesborough, the Rough and Ready Tavern served

data.event: In August 1864, prior to the Battle of Jonesborough, the Rough and Ready Tavern served briefly as headquarters for Confederate General William J Hardee.

event.title: was incorporated as a city in 1956

data.event: Its name was changed when it was incorporated as a city in 1956.

event.title: January 1978, when the Georgia General Assembly voted

data.event: Mountain View was a city from 1956 to January 1978, when the Georgia General Assembly voted to repeal the city charter.

event.title: ’ve had controversy out there for 20 years

data.event: State Representative Rudolph Johnson of Morrow, chair of the delegation said, “They’ve had controversy out there for 20 years.
